name: Jason Statham
bio: Jason Statham is an English actor known for his action roles. Before his acting career, he was a competitive diver and model. He rose to fame through his collaborations with director Guy Ritchie in films like 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels' and 'Snatch', before becoming a leading action star in franchises like 'The Transporter', 'The Expendables', and the 'Fast & Furious' series.
